mapper.select: SELECT permission FROM sys_user INNER JOIN sys_user_role on sys_user.user_id = sys_user_role.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role on sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu on sys_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu on sys_role_menu.menu_id = sys_menu.menu_id WHERE sys_user.username = #{username}
